response.overview: "The Woody and Friends Movie" centers on a bold and impressive origin story about Woody, the roughest, toughest, and aspiring rootin'-tootin' Western cowboy who was born to become a Lati√±o star-studded sensation. He must unleash an unexpected and glorious performance of his own in an epic adventure that summons him to uncover a passionate secret beyond anything no one could have ever imagined before. When he authentically discovers his destiny calling out, Woody must defend himself on an undergoing detour demolition that was threatened by an emerging battle of Caribbean rock pirates, dastardly evil bandits, and an imposing enemy presence with a mysterious agenda. With the help of loyal and overconfident space ranger Buzz Lightyear by his side, Woody sets into motion and takes on his most heroic challenge: to make his break to freedom, and most of all, to discover whatever it takes to prove to the world who he really is meant to be.
response.tagline: One motion picture adventure is about to be unleased.
response.title: The Woody and Friends Movie
